commitResults.messageBody:
- Renamed chatbot to "Helix" and updated all references in the code
- Ensured compliance with Task 0 requirements:
  - Added a welcome message with ASCII art to greet the user
  - Displayed a farewell message on exiting

- Enabled chatbot to echo user commands
- Added graceful exit on “bye”

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add and List commands for task management
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented the 'add' command to allow users to add tasks to a task list
- Implemented the 'list' command to display all tasks in the task list
- Refactored code to follow Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles

commitResults.messageTitle: feat: Add ability to mark tasks as done or not done
commitResults.messageBody:
- Implemented the functionality to mark tasks as done
- Added the ability to unmark tasks, changing their status to not done
- Updated the task list display to reflect task completion statuses
- Used the Task class to represent tasks, aligning with the recommended A-Classes extension
